info.title: myapp
info.description:
![CUIT logo](https://cuit.columbia.edu/sites/default/files/logo/CUIT_Logo_286_web.jpg "CUIT logo")


A sample API that uses courses as an example to demonstrate representing
[JSON:API 1.0](http://jsonapi.org/format) in the OpenAPI 3.0 specification.



(c) 2018-2024 The Trustees of Columbia University in the City of New York

get.description: A course of instruction. e.g. COMSW1002 Computing in Context

parameters.name: fields[courses]
parameters.description: endpoint return only specific fields in the response on a per-type basis by including a fields[TYPE] query parameter.

parameters.name: filter[course_description__in]
parameters.description: Multiple values may be separated by commas.

parameters.name: filter[course_identifier__in]
parameters.description: Multiple values may be separated by commas.

parameters.name: filter[course_terms__term_identifier__in]
parameters.description: Multiple values may be separated by commas.

parameters.name: filter[id__in]
parameters.description: Multiple values may be separated by commas.

parameters.name: filter[search]
parameters.description: A search term.

parameters.name: filter[subject_area_code__in]
parameters.description: Multiple values may be separated by commas.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: include query parameter to allow the client to customize which related resources should be returned.

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: [list of fields to sort by](https://jsonapi.org/format/#fetching-sorting)

get.description:
We call this a NonModel but it's really a model that has no backing database.
This allows us to take advantage of all the model-based features.
